key.name: show-badge
key.description: Attempt to show a badge on the dock/taskbar of the desktop with the number on unread articles. (Only possible with compile option -DWITH_LIBUNITY=ON)

key.name: restore-searchterm
key.summary: restore the search term on startup
key.description: If active the current search term will be saved on exit and restored next startup.

key.name: do-not-track
key.description: Ask server to not track FeedReader on making requests.

key.name: dont-download-images
key.description: Disable download of images of articles.

key.name: ignore-tls-errors
key.description: Ignore all tls errors regarding the connection to the rss server

key.name: feedreader-autostart
key.description: on startup of the daemon copy the desktop file in the autostart folder

key.name: sync-on-startup
key.description: start a sync as soon as the UI is started

key.name: quit-daemon
key.description: quit the daemon as soon as the UI closes -> no background syncs possible

key.name: article-select-text
key.description: enable selecting text in the articleview, also copy text
